page.title: 18Children's Games, Aldridge
page.content: {BULLDOG The object of{Bulldog}is to run from one end of the netball pitch to the other without being tigged, if you are you must go in the middle and try and catch the rest with them. If you go over the edge lines you are on. If you are the only one left in the circle the people on count to ten then they can come in the circle and get you. { SLAM { Slam}is a game played with a ball.You have to hit the ball against the wall, if you miss you are out. The person who kicked it first has to get it into a hard place and whoever's go it is next has to hit the wall. It keeps on going until there is one person left, and he is the winner. If the ball goes on the roof you are out. The game can be played with as many players as you want.
